entry.title: [Global][Managed Kubernetes Service] - rolling out an update
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 30, 10:00 UTC  -  Feb 1, 15:00 UTC

Jan 25, 01:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 30/01/2024 10:00 UTC
End time : 01/02/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update.
All cluster with an "ALWAYS_UPDATE" policy will be updated.
This update will target the following components in each cluster:
- Main Kubernetes components
- Network Engine
- Storage controller
- Metrics server
- DNS server

Our team is currently working on the regions: GRA7 GRA9 and SBG5.

End time : 08/01/2024 18:00 UTC

entry.title: [GRA][AI Notebook] - S3/Workspace Backend
entry.content:
Jan 8, 08:51 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 05/01/2024 10:29 UTC
End time : 05/01/2024 19:26 UTC
Service impact : All notebook using S3 as workspace backend were having a malfunction on start/stop which may have led to SYNC_FAILED status.
Related incident https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/3s8cs8pm3dkq
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 5, 20:21 UTC
Monitoring - The error rate has returned to its nominal status. The situation has been stabilized since 19:26 UTC.
Our teams will continue to monitor services.

Jan 5, 18:49 UTC
Identified - Following the actions carried out by our technicians the situation has improved. Currently the error rate has stabilized. We are still in the process of reducing it.

Jan 5, 17:25 UTC
Update - A significant improvement of the services is ongoing but the situation is not actually nominal. We are still investigating for the root cause

Jan 5, 16:35 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 05/01/2024 10:29 UTC
Service impact : All notebook using S3 as workspace backend are having a malfunction on start/stop that may lead to SYNC_FAILED status. Customer can trigger a retry through CLI ovhai notebook push-data $ID but there is no guarantee of success as long as the S3 incident is ongoing
Related incident https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/3s8cs8pm3dkq
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
